summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on October 20, 2010. The email contains a confidentiality notice and indicates that the information may be attorney-client privileged. It emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a communication with Jes Staley regarding office matters.

The email emphasizes that unauthorized use or disclosure is prohibited.
